Sculptures and memorials are not made of it. Almost everything else is. The versatile Μagnesite tacitly participates in the widest range of modern day uses, to the benefit of civilization and the environment.

We’ve played our part. For over sixty years we’ve made it our business to create Magnesite products and grades for practically all industrial applications. Some of them have sprung right out of our laboratory. Most of them we developed alongside our clients. Every single one of them can be traced back to our mines and our superior processing technology.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1683843065913{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://pakmagnesia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/chemical-bkg_0.jpg?id=904) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”specialist”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1678676410213{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”These are some of the industrial applications for various materials:” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:25px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1683842546991{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #3e3d40 !important;}” el_class=”black-boxi”]

Refractories:

DBM 90%, DBM 92%, DBM 95%, and DBM 97% are used in the production of refractories.

Foundry (Coatings & Ramming Mix):

DBM 92% and DBM 95% are utilized for coatings and ramming mix in foundry operations.

Noble Ferro Alloys Manufacturing:

DBM 90% and DBM 92% are used in the manufacturing of noble ferro alloys.

Magnesium Fertilizers:

CCM 85%, CCM 88%, and CCM 90% are used for producing magnesium fertilizers.

Soil Treatment:

CCM 80% is used for soil treatment purposes.

Leather Tanning:

CCM 88% and CCM 90% are utilized for leather tanning processes.

Industrial Flooring (Sorel Cement):

CCM 87% and CCM 88% are used for producing industrial flooring using Sorel cement.

MgO Panels:

CCM 80% and CCM 83% are used in the production of MgO panels.

Abrasive/Polishing:

CCM 87% and CCM 88% are utilized for abrasive and polishing purposes.

Emery Stone:

CCM 87% and CCM 88% are used in the manufacturing of emery stones.

Boiler Fuel/Coal Additive:

CCM 90% and CCM 92% are used as additives in boiler fuel/coal production.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
